title: Ranked client bugging out, Riot help!
body:
After winning a bunch of norms I decided to play some ranked, first champ select I got a black screen so I couldn't like pick anything or ban anything so that counted as a dodge, now I got a " lol client not responding" and it closed by it self WTF 2 dodges in RANKED
Riot help!!!! It was fine for the normal draft games I played, just bugging out for ranked and now I have 2 dodges omg pls give me my lp back
First I had to wait 5 min for the unintentional dodge, now 28 min? WTF
Help!!!!!!!!!!! Please get rid of this queue wait time, it wasn't my fault your shit glitched out and gave me a black screen and stuff

edit: negative 13 lp? WTF riot

replies.body:
If you got both a black screen in Champ Select and a Client not responding error, it definitely sounds like there might be some sort of connection issue between your computer and PvP.net (the client).  If this continues to happen even in normals or custom games as well, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664).  There are a lot of steps there, but they are crucial in hopefully resolving this issue.

Let me know if you are still experiencing issues at all!

No it doesn't happen in normals or customs at all, I was playing all day and it was fine, but when I decided to play ranked like an hour ago I got a black screen after 10 seconds into the champ select. When I moved my mouse around, the tooltips for stuff still popped up like " friends list" etc, just could not see anything. So after I waited the 5 min and re-queued, this time I did not get a black screen but instead the client just exited by it self and I lost 10 lp and now I am still waiting to queue up again, had to wait 35 min in total and am at negative 13 lp =/=
Not a connection issue, just your shit fuckin up as usual
